post.title: fs: brand new samsung galaxy s (i9000)
post.content: hi, i was recently in europe and picked up a samsung galaxy s while i was there. it is the 8gb model and it brand new, sealed in package. if you have any questions, please ask. i'm asking $725 shipped in canada (add $10 for xpresspost). cheers note: i have this in hand ready to ship, not pre-order!
